name: Essencial
description:
Essencial is a clicker developed for Mini Jam 15 with the theme Technology.

I interpreted the theme as mining resources to gain better technology, and turned it into a clicker loosely based on Adventure Capitalist. 

While mining you discover a strange Essence, this essence is like a gold mine and as you sell more of it you can dig deeper and find even more different types of Essence.

Feel free to be critical in the comments

On the downloadable version its Escape to quit the game and it is recommended to play in Fullscreen otherwise the UI doesn't scale properly
